title: SAMSUNG Galaxy A13 LTE Cell Phone, Factory Unlocked Android Smartphone, 32GB, Multi Lens Camera, Infinity-V HD+ Display Screen, Long Battery Life, Expandable Storage, US Version, Black
description: Staying in touch with the people and things you love most is important, which is why the awesomely practical Galaxy A13 LTE smartphone is outfitted with exactly what you need to stay connected. A long-lasting battery keeps you going, the multi-lens camera makes capturing and sharing your moments a breeze and its infinity display lets you play back all of your favorite memories in HD+. It’s all you need at a price you’ll love. *Wall charger and headphones sold separately; use only Samsung-approved chargers and cables. To avoid injury or damage to your device, do not use incompatible, worn or damaged batteries, chargers or cables. Supports up to 15W Fast Charging. For more information on your device, please visit www.samsung. com. **MicroSD card sold separately. ***Private Share features for both the sender and receiver requires Galaxy mobile devices with Android 9 or later and the Private Share app.
